mapper.select: SELECT P.PRODUCT_NO, P.PRODUCT_NAME, P.PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_THUMBNAIL FROM TBL_PRODUCT P INNER JOIN TBL_PRODUCT_IMG I ON P.PRODUCT_NO = I.PRODUCT_NO WHERE PRODUCT_CUSTOM = 'Y' ORDER BY PRODUCT_NO DESC OFFSET 0 ROWS FETCH FIRST 8 ROWS ONLY
SELECT C.CLASS_NO, C.CLASS_NAME, C.CLASS_DATE, C.PRICE, THUMB_PATH FROM TBL_CLASS C INNER JOIN TBL_ONEDAYTHUMB T ON C.CLASS_NO = T.CLASS_NO ORDER BY C.CLASS_NO OFFSET 0 ROWS FETCH FIRST 4 ROWS ONLY
